notes: Lexical network AdjDeriNet consists of pairs of base adjectives and their derivatives. It contains nearly 18 thousand base adjectives that are base words for more than 26 thousand lexemes of several parts of speech.
title: AdjDeriNet: Words Derived from Adjectives in Czech
